summary: Swordswoman Meng Hung must work with Fan Tien-fu, to find then protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. If they should fail, the dynasty will fall.
cast: Szu Shih|Lieh Lo|Pei-Shan Chang|Chun Chen|Pin Chang|Feng Yu|Chia Chien Li|Mien Fang|Shen Chan|Hsi Chang|Hsien Cheng|Chun Erh|Li-Jen Ho|Chiu Lee|Shao-Hua Li|Yunzhong Li|Tien-Hsi Tang|Te-Chiang Teng|Chien Tsao|Tsai-Pao Tung|Mei Wong|Brandy Yuen|Shun-Yee Yuen|Woo-Ping Yuen|Yat Chor Yuen
title: Long hu hui feng yun
